div.opener:
Lieut Lieutenant
Wm William Lauderdale
NASHVILLE, NOVEMBER 21st, 1812 SIR,
div.p: You are hereby notified that you are appointed First Lieut Lieutenant __ in a volunteer company of infantry in the service of the United States commanded by Captain William L. Alexander__ who hath been commissioned conformably to the acts of Congress of February 6th and July 6th 1812, respecting volunteers; and you are hereby authorized to act as First Lieut__ in said company until you may be commissioned by the President: and you are further entitled to receive all the pay and emoluments of First Lieut__ in said company: and required to execute all the duties enjoined by law; and to exercise all the privileges secured by law to an officer of your rank in the service of the United States__ Given under my hand at Nashville, this 21st day of November, 1812.
div.closer: Willie Blount by authority of the president of the United States Lieut William Lauderdale
